void preorder(Tree root) {
    if (!root) return;
    stack<Tree> s;
    s.push(root);
    while (!s.empty()) {
        Tree node = s.top(); s.pop();
        cout << node->data << ' ';
        if (node->RChild) s.push(node->RChild);
        if (node->LChild) s.push(node->LChild);
    }
}

void inorder(Tree root) {
    stack<Tree> s;
    Tree p = root;
    while (p || !s.empty()) {
        if (p) {
            s.push(p);
            p = p->LChild;
        } else {
            p = s.top(); s.pop();
            cout << p->data << ' ';
            p = p->RChild;
        }
    }
}

void postorder(Tree root) {
    if (!root) return;
    stack<Tree> s1, s2;
    s1.push(root);
    while (!s1.empty()) {
        Tree node = s1.top(); s1.pop();
        s2.push(node);
        if (node->LChild) s1.push(node->LChild);
        if (node->RChild) s1.push(node->RChild);
    }
    while (!s2.empty()) {
        cout << s2.top()->data << ' ';
        s2.pop();
    }
}

int firstUniqChar(char* s) {

    int queue[26];

    int len = strlen(s);

}

def labmain(filename): # å®éªŒä¸»ä½“ï¼Œç”Ÿæˆå®éªŒæ•°æ®
    ls = []
    n = 10000
    endtimes = n
    fnew = open(filename,"w",newline="")
    csv_writer = csv.writer(fnew)


    for i in range(endtimes):
        ls.append(i)
        t1 = Timer(f"ls[{i}]",globals={'ls': ls})
        writerow = [i,f"{t1.timeit(number=100000):.8f}"]
        csv_writer.writerow(writerow)
    fnew.close()

t1.timeit(number=100000) ä¸­çš„ number è®¾ç½®æ‰§è¡Œçš„æ€»æ¬¡æ•°ã€‚

# æ•°æ®å¯è§†åŒ–
def plot_func(csvfile):
    fo = open(csvfile,"r")
    reader = csv.reader(fo)
    x_list = []
    y_list = []
    for row in reader:
        x_list.append(int(row[0]))
        y_list.append(float(row[1])*100)
    plt.scatter(x=x_list, y=y_list,s=3)
    plt.show()
    fo.close()

å›å½’åˆ†æ

æ£€æŸ¥ $x_i$ , $y_i$ æ˜¯å¦æ»¡è¶³æ–¹ç¨‹ $y=k$.

def reg_func(filename):
    fo = open(filename,"r")
    reader = csv.reader(fo)
    x_list = []
    y_list = []
    for row in reader:
        x_list.append(int(row[0]))
        y_list.append(float(row[1])*100)
    # è®¡ç®— sum_(x/y)i, sum_(x/y)i^2, sum_xi*yi
    sum_xi = sum(x_list)
    sum_yi = sum(y_list)
    sum_xi2 = sum(i**2 for i in x_list)
    sum_yi2 = sum(j**2 for j in y_list)
    sum_xiyi = sum([a * b for a, b in zip(x_list, y_list)])
    l_xx = sum_xi - sum_xi2**2/len(x_list)
    l_yy = sum_yi - sum_yi2**2/len(y_list)
    l_xy = sum_xi - sum_xi*sum_yi/len(x_list)
    b = l_xy / l_xx
    a = sum_yi/len(y_list) - b*sum_xi/len(x_list)
    # è®¡ç®—ç›¸å…³ç³»æ•°
    rate_r = l_xy / pow(l_xx*l_yy, 2)
    return b,a,rate_r

def main():
    filename = "ç´¢å¼•å®éªŒæ•°æ®.csv"
    labmain(filename)
    plot_func(filename)
    b, a , r = reg_func(filename)
    print(f"çº¿æ€§å›å½’æ–¹ç¨‹ä¸º y= {b:.4f}x + {a:.4f} ç›¸å…³ç³»æ•°r = {r:.4f}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

def gcd_short_division(a, b):
    if a < b:
        a, b = b, a  # ç¡®ä¿ a æ˜¯è¾ƒå¤§çš„æ•°

    divisor = 2  # ä»æœ€å°çš„è´¨æ•°å¼€å§‹
    gcd = 1      # åˆå§‹æœ€å¤§å…¬çº¦æ•°ä¸º 1

        if a % divisor == 0 and b % divisor == 0:
            # å¦‚æœ divisor æ˜¯ a å’Œ b çš„å…¬å› æ•°
            gcd *= divisor
            a //= divisor
            b //= divisor
        elif a % divisor == 0:

        elif b % divisor == 0:
            b //= divisor  # åªå¯¹ b è¿›è¡Œé™¤æ³•
        else:
            divisor += 1  # å°è¯•ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªæ›´å¤§çš„å› æ•°

    return gcd
